mapper.select:
SELECT MP.MP_NO, MP.MP_CODE, MP.SO_CODE, MP.EMP_ID, MP.MP_STATUS, MP.MP_PRIORITY, MP.MP_CREATED_AT, MP.MP_UPDATED_AT, MP.MP_START_DATE, MP.MP_END_DATE,
E.EMP_NAME AS empName FROM MFG_PLANS MP LEFT JOIN SALES_ORDER SO ON MP.SO_CODE = SO.SO_CODE LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON MP.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID ORDER BY MP.MP_NO DESC

SELECT SO.SO_CODE AS soCode, SO.SO_QTY AS soQty, CD.CMN_DETAIL_NAME AS qtyUnitName, SO.SO_DUE_DATE AS soDueDate, SO.PDT_CODE AS pdtCode, P.PDT_NAME AS pdtName, C.CLT_NAME AS cltName FROM SALES_ORDER SO LEFT JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL CD ON SO.QTY_UNIT = CD.CMN_DETAIL_CODE LEFT JOIN PRODUCTS P ON SO.PDT_CODE = P.PDT_CODE LEFT JOIN CLIENTS C ON SO.CLT_CODE = C.CLT_CODE WHERE SO_STATUS = 'SO_CONFIRMED' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MFG_PLANS MP WHERE MP.SO_CODE = SO.SO_CODE )

SELECT B.BOM_NO, B.PARENT_PDT_CODE, B.CHILD_ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_TYPE, B.BOM_QTY, B.BOM_UNIT, B.BOM_PRC_TYPE, NVL(PRIOR B.BOM_QTY, 1) * B.BOM_QTY AS TOTAL_QTY,
3 AS leadTime FROM BOM B
START WITH B.PARENT_PDT_CODE = 'WIP013' CONNECT BY PRIOR B.CHILD_ITEM_CODE = B.PARENT_PDT_CODE
SELECT MTL_CODE, SUM(CURRENT_QTY) FROM MATERIAL_INVENTORY GROUP BY MTL_CODE

SELECT BOM_NO, PARENT_PDT_CODE, CHILD_ITEM_CODE, ITEM_TYPE, BOM_QTY, BOM_UNIT, BOM_PRC_TYPE, PRIOR BOM_QTY * BOM_QTY AS TOTAL_QTY FROM BOM START WITH PARENT_PDT_CODE IN ( SELECT SO.PDT_CODE FROM MFG_PLANS MP JOIN SALES_ORDER SO ON MP.SO_CODE = SO.SO_CODE JOIN COMMONCODE_DETAIL CD ON MP.MP_STATUS = CD.CMN_DETAIL_CODE WHERE CMN_CODE = 'MP_STATUS' AND CD.CMN_DETAIL_CODE IN ('MPS002', 'MPS003') ) CONNECT BY PRIOR CHILD_ITEM_CODE = PARENT_PDT_CODE
mapper.update: UPDATE MFG_PLANS SET MP_PRIORITY = #{mpPriority, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP_STATUS = #{mpStatus, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP_START_DATE = #{mpStartDate, jdbcType=DATE}, MP_END_DATE = #{mpEndDate, jdbcType=DATE}, MP_UPDATED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE MP_CODE = #{mpCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT MS.MS_NO, MS.MS_CODE, MP.MP_CODE, MS.EMP_ID, MS.MS_STATUS, MS.MS_PRIORITY, MS.PDT_CODE, MS.PRC_CODE, MS.ALLOCATED_QTY, MS.MS_CREATED_AT, MS.MS_UPDATED_AT, MS.MS_START_DATE, MS.MS_END_DATE,
E.EMP_NAME AS empName FROM MFG_SCHEDULES MS LEFT JOIN MFG_PLANS MP ON MS.MP_CODE = MP.MP_CODE LEFT JOIN MATERIAL_INVENTORY MI ON MS.ALLOCATED_QTY = MI.ALLOCATED_QTY LEFT JOIN EMPLOYEES E ON MP.EMP_ID = E.EMP_ID ORDER BY MS.MS_NO DESC
